mapper.select: select COMRECINFSGMTSEQNO, GRTDNM, REPORTFLAG from PBCRS_REPORT_COMRECINFSGMT

select count(1) from PBCRS_REPORT_ComRecInfSgmt info1 join PBCRS_REPORT_OtrRec info2 on info1.ComRecInfSgmtSeqNo=info2.ComRecInfSgmtSeqNo where info1.ComRecInfSgmtSeqNo= #{ComRecInfSgmtSeqNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
